infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: SnapConnect needs camera access to capture workout photos and videos with AR filters.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: SnapConnect needs photo library access to save your progress photos.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: SnapConnect needs location access to show nearby fitness events.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: SnapConnect needs microphone access for video recording with audio.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: SnapConnect needs access to your health data to provide personalized fitness coaching and track your progress.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: SnapConnect can update your health data with workout information and achievements.
